trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4WRENRIC_00631_WRENRIC_000_000<tab>The Inn's home only to the patients and their carers, and they don't always have time to keep an eye out for danger. That's my job.
TEXT_REGNOR4WRENRIC_00631_WRENRIC_000_010<tab>I've not seen Halric for a while, I'm afraid. He probably hasn't wandered far, though.
TEXT_REGNOR4WRENRIC_00631_WRENRIC_000_020<tab>When you choose to work here, you accept that bad things might happen. Expect it, even. But this is just...
TEXT_REGNOR4WRENRIC_00631_WRENRIC_000_030<tab>I've got to stay sharp, keep my wits about me. I miss Tesleen as much as anyone, but I can't let my thoughts stray from the task at hand.

TEXT_REGNOR4WRENRIC_00631_WRENRIC_000_040<tab>There are those that would take advantage of the darkness returning. Sneakthieves, prowling beasts, and the like. In all honesty, it has made our job a lot harder.
